title: দ্য মিরর এশিয়া - Bangladeshi news portal

title: Breaking: BNP demands for neutral caretaker government in 12th national election
description: BNP has demanded a neutral caretaker government for the 12th national election of Bangladesh. The party's standing committee made the demand at a press conference held on Saturday.

title: Ronaldo's Portugal faces Morocco in World Cup quarterfinals
description: Cristiano Ronaldo and his Portugal team will face Morocco in the World Cup quarterfinals on Saturday. The match is scheduled to begin at 17:00 local time.
